title: New: QT – Hey QT
body:
Anyone who has seen **SOPHIE** live over the past year or so can confirm how awesome this track is in a live setting.

Now, being released as a collaboration between **SOPHIE** and P C Music head-honcho **A. G. Cook**, and apparently through XL Recordings (produced by Diplo…?), it’s surfaced online as part of their Boilerroom set earlier this week. A nine minute long mindfuck with a four minute spoken word intro, it’s unlike anything you’ve ever heard before, and that’s a guarantee. Skip to 4.30 to hear the song itself, or if you’ve got the time, bask in the genius of the entire composition.
